headline: APA Corp. price target lowered to $24 from $29 at Citi
summary: Citi lowered the firm’s price target on APA Corp. (APA) to $24 from $29 and keeps a Neutral rating on the shares. The firm updated models in the oil and gas exploration and production group following the Q3 reports. It sees opportunities for continuation of recent efficiency improvement trends, potential upside to known synergy capture and efforts to improve longer term gas monetization. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaking financial news. Try Now
